detail_desc: Round-necked T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Hats in soft cotton jersey.
Bracelet in soft faux fur with a snap-on strap and soft toy head with embroidered details at one end. Size 3.5x17 cm.

Top and pair of trousers in organic cotton. Top in soft jersey with buttons at the top. Trousers in narrow-wale corduroy with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist, a fake fly, one side pocket with a decorative button and elasticated hems.

5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed denim with stretch. Regular waist, zip fly and gently tapered legs. The jeans are made from selvedge denim, a high-quality denim woven on traditional shuttle looms with a distinctive red/white selvedge that stops the fabric from unravelling.
Hipster briefs in lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back with decorative straps.
Fitted top in organic cotton soft jersey with a V-neck and short sleeves.

Shirt in an Oxford cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Henley top in sturdy, ribbed cotton jersey with a button placket and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Boat-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Joggers in washed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and a back pocket. Tapered legs with decorative stitching at the knees and ribbed hems.
Calf-length dress in patterned mesh with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Wrapover with ties at one side and an airy, softly draping skirt. Lined.
Dress in an airy crêpe weave with a frill-trimmed V-neck and wrapover opening, ties at the waist and a seam and flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Knee-length dress in viscose jersey with a V-neck, short sleeves and a detachable tie belt under the bust.

LIMITED EDITION. Patterned calf-length dress in an airy weave with a V-neck and concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the top. Concealed zip and button at the back and long dolman sleeves with a slit and covered button at the cuffs. Seam at the waist with pleats for a looser silhouette, and a straight, draping skirt that is slightly longer at the back. Lined.
Wide, softly draping trousers in a soft, fine knit with a regular, elasticated waist.
Shirt in softly draping matt silk with a collar and buttons down the front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, wide, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Jumper in a soft, loose knit with a V-neck, long raglan sleeves and roll edges at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
Knee-length, gently flared skirt in textured-knit jersey with a slight sheen. Wide, visible elastication at the waist. Unlined.
Fully lined bikini. Flounced top with narrow shoulder straps with a small metal decoration attached to one strap. Matching bottoms.

Calf-length satin dress with a deep V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the top. Short puff sleeves with gathered elastication for a gently draped effect, an elasticated seam at the waist and a small frill trim around the neckline, waist and skirt. Lined at the top.
Ballet pumps with pointed toes and a narrow heel strap. Satin linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Small embroidery detail at the bottom of one sleeve.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif, ribbed neckline and short sleeves.
Sarong in an airy, patterned weave. Size 130x150 cm.
Sleeveless body in ribbed viscose jersey with a deep V-neck front and back, a flatlock seam down the back and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with flatlock seams, side panels, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shorts in stretch twill with an embroidered motif on one side, an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud. Fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Parka in a lightly brushed cotton weave with a detachable, jersey-lined hood, appliqué and embroidered motif at the top and a stand-up collar. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, flap front pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with raw edges around the neckline and sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Bucket bag in grained imitation leather with a narrow shoulder strap and drawstring closure. Unlined. Size 12x16x19 cm.
Fine-knit pointelle cardigan in a soft viscose blend with dropped shoulders, slits in the sides and no buttons. Ribbing at the cuffs, hem and along the side seams and front opening.
Leather belt with a metal buckle. Width approx. 3 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in mesh made from strips of sequins with an elasticated neckline and sequined fringes at the hem. Unlined.
Dress in soft woven fabric with short frilled sleeves, a yoke and buttons at the back. Unlined.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in woven fabric with lace and decorative ties at the front, elastication at the top and short sleeves.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Hairband in soft faux fur with a sewn-in wrapover detail at the front and wide elastic at the back.
Short coat in marled bouclé yarn with a small stand-up collar, dropped shoulders, concealed zip and press-studs down the front and flap welt pockets. Lined.
Patterned bow tie with a matching handkerchief. Bow tie with an adjustable strap and fastening at the back. Width 11 cm. Size of handkerchief 33x33 cm.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a round neckline. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in organic cotton jersey with concealed press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.

Baby Exclusive. Sleeveless romper suit in soft slub jersey with narrow shoulder straps, buttons at the top and elasticated hems. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (except in sizes 1-4Y).
Vest tops in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Regular waist and a concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short-sleeved sports tops in fast-drying functional fabric with good air permeability to wick away moisture. Some of the polyester content of the tops is recycled.
Jacket in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with embroidery, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button, buttons at the cuffs and an adjustable tab with a button at the hem. Unlined.
Ankle-length trousers in stretch cotton twill with a high, elasticated waist, side pockets, flap leg pockets and tapered legs with elastication at the hems.
Slip-on fabric trainers with elastic gores in the sides. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a text motif, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline and a drawstring at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Joggers in sturdy marled jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.

Jumpsuit in a soft, patterned weave with embroidery. Short cap sleeves, press-studs at the top and an elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative bow. Side pockets and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Padded jacket with a detachable, faux fur trimmed hood with a wind flap with press-studs. Stand-up collar, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and smocking at the sides.

Padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with a detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Zipped side pockets and an adjustable hook and loop fastening and fleece inner ribbing at the cuffs. Slightly longer at the back. Reflective details. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Short strappy top in soft organic cotton jersey with printed contrasting colour panels at the sides.
Straight-cut shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Hard smartphone case in printed transparent plastic. Fits iPhone 6/6s.
Bodysuit in soft cotton jersey with a rounded lace collar and press-studs at the back of the neck. Long, puff sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and press-studs at the crotch.
Short, fitted jersey top with long sleeves and a visible seam down the front. Slightly shorter front with a knot detail at the hem.
Glittery set with a tulle skirt, handbag and an elastic hairband with a tulle bow. Skirt with an elasticated waist. Handbag with two handles at the top.
Bra tops in cotton jersey with wide shoulder straps and unlined cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Covered elastication at the hem. No fasteners.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with striped ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and a zipped back pocket.

Knee-length nursing dress in an airy weave with a unique nursing feature, 3/4-length sleeves with elasticated cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist with decorative ties and a flounce to the hem. Unlined. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Warm-lined, ankle boot slippers in imitation suede with a loop at the sides of the shaft. Faux fur linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Suit waistcoat woven in a wool blend with lining fabric at the back. Buttons at the front, a chest pocket, welt front pockets and an adjustable tab at the back. Lined.
Fancy dress cape in jersey with a concealed hook and loop fastening at the neck. Unlined.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a gently rounded hem.
Lightweight, unlined liner socks in fast-drying functional fabric with reinforcement at the toes and heels.

Cargo trousers in stretch twill made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with flap leg and back pockets with a concealed press-stud. Fake fly, slim legs with seams at the knees and wide jersey ribbing at the waist for a comfortable fit.
Fitted jumper in a ribbed viscose blend with a square neckline and long sleeves.
Set with a hat and scarf in a soft cable knit. Hat with a double-layered ribbed hem and pompom on top. Scarf with rib-knit short sides.

department_name: Sneakers small girl inactive from s2
detail_desc: Cotton canvas hi-tops with lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, a loop at the back, canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Vest tops in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Straight-cut top in airy jersey crêpe with a boat neck and short sleeves with pleated trims.

Coat woven in a cashmere blend with a brushed finish. Large notch lapels, double-breasted button fastening at the front and diagonal front pockets with a wide welt. Wide tab with buttons at the back. Unlined.
Oversized T-shirt in mesh with a trim around the neckline and dropped shoulders.

Bomber jacket in woven fabric with a small, ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, welt side pockets and a zipped sleeve pocket. Visible, gathered seams down the sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Fully lined swimsuit with a deep V-neck at the front, triangular cups with removable inserts, and cut-out sections at the back and sides. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back.
